snippet.title: Vasilisa and Baba Yaga - Official Trailer | WLG Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Dive into the spooky world of Vasilisa and Baba Yaga and learn more about the story in this trailer for the upcoming game based on the Russian folktale "Vasilisa the Beautiful". Vasilisa and Baba Yaga is a scary story about the journey to the mistress of the forbidden forest for magical powers. A demo for Vasilisa and Baba Yaga is available now on Steam.
